REQ. cloud9 Xclass Europe - FSX
REQ. wilco 777 FSX

Xervish. Just install it to the default FS9. then when you start up AS go to options and click "start paused". then start up FS9 or FSX dosent matter. Then go to AS and click on refresh. It will give you the weather for which ever flight sim you started. You must have FSUIPC installed in both FS9 and FSX. I think the latest version is 4.0.1.0

thx...

Hey 4x-axg You missed the point.  Now there's 2 torrents of the same thing being seeded.  Which increases the chances that it will die sooner.

People need to use the search function before making new torrents of the same files, it's a waste of time to post something that's already posted, and been downloaded hundreds of times, and is STILL being seeded.

As for that version being older? Not really, download that one, head to the Hifisim site and Boom, download the latest update. Sounds simple to me.
